reasoning: Task involves running already-implemented benchmarks (E01-E07) and updating documentation with results. Infrastructure is complete - no new code required. Multiple files need updating but changes are straightforward data population. No external integrations or infrastructure changes needed.

scope.notes: 7 experiment REPORT.md files + SUMMARY.md + product-requirements.md + possibly development-plan.md. All changes are documentation updates with benchmark data.

integrations.notes: No external integrations required. Benchmark framework (Criterion) is already configured and working.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure changes needed. Benchmarks run locally via cargo bench commands.

knowledge.notes: All benchmark infrastructure is implemented. Reports have clear TBD placeholders showing exactly what data to populate. Criterion benchmark commands are documented in each report.

concerns: Benchmark execution may take significant time (7 experiments)
Results may not meet go/no-go targets requiring architectural decisions
Hardware/environment variations may affect benchmark results
risk.notes: Low risk as this is documentation and benchmarking work. No code changes that could break functionality. Main risk is time to execute all benchmarks.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: Documentation-heavy task with benchmark execution. Existing tests should continue to pass. Minimal validation sufficient - verify benchmark commands run successfully and documentation updates are consistent.

task_breakdown.summary: Run 7 benchmark experiments and update product requirements with validated performance data

major_steps.description: Execute E01-E07 benchmark experiments via cargo bench commands
Extract results from Criterion output and populate experiment REPORT.md files
Make go/no-go decisions based on benchmark results against targets
Update docs/product-requirements.md Section 1.3 hypothesis validation status
Mark development-plan.md tasks as complete where applicable

outputs: Updated E01-E07 REPORT.md files with actual benchmark data
Updated SUMMARY.md with consolidated experiment results
Updated product-requirements.md with validated hypothesis status
Go/no-go decisions documented for each experiment
